txt.en: Rokóbu lets out a strangled cry and collapses, defeated
You hear calls to arms, and see fortifications built to stop you
Defeat Barkhûshim champions in Kûr Anzar ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Barkhûshim skirmishers in Kûr Anzar ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'We are close to retaking Kûr Anzar and driving the loathsome Barkhûshim out. Soon we will reunite all of Hamât under our banner of hope. Kûr Anzar is the key.\n\n'We need to seize a foothold in Kûr Anzar, from which we may strike at the heart of Okhíso and his twisted realm. You are to be the point of our spear, [placeholder]. It's time to make our move. We ask that you move through the lower portion of the city and drive their forces back in the lower ward. We know Okhíso's loathsome aide, Rokóbu to be leading them. If you get the chance, plunge your sword into his chest for me. Now is the time that Hamât rises again!'

'This is quite the day, my friend. Quite the triumph. And you killed Rokóbu?'

Mizadi lets out a long, loud whoop of triumph.

'That will prove to be a severe blow to Okhíso. We still have much to do before we can declare victory, but this is a huge first step. Without your bravery, I fear we would have been lost, [placeholder]. You have my thanks.
Destroyed All-seeing fortifications ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat a Barkhûshim sorceress in Kûr Anzar
Find and defeat Rokóbu in Kûr Anzar
Rokóbu emerges with a primal scream, ready to do battle
Destroy the fortifications in front of you and defeat the All-seeing moving to stop you.
Mizâdi has asked you to lead the charge to secure the lower ward of Kûr Anzar. Once successful, Mizâdi can set up a foothold outside Kûr Anzar.
Report your success to Mizâdi in Urmâkh.
Destroy All-seeing fortifications ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Find and defeat Rokóbu, Okhíso's fearsome champion.

Ready yourself for battle, then move swiftly into Kûr Anzar and defeat the forces of the All-seeing. Find and defeat the loathsome Barkhûshim leading them, Rokóbu. Kûr Anzar is located east of Urmâkh.
Defeat All-seeing cultists ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Find and defeat Rokóbu, Okhíso's fearsome champion.
Find and defeat Rokóbu
Find and defeat Rokóbu
Report your success to Mizâdi in Urmâkh
Assault Kûr Anzar's lower ward
